text: The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera División, commonly known as Primera División, or LaLiga, and officially known as LALIGA EA SPORTS (stylized as all caps) for sponsorship reasons, is the men's top professional football league of the Spanish football league system. It is contested by 20 teams. ==2023–2024 clubs== *Real Madrid CF *FC Barcelona *Atlético Madrid *Real Sociedad *Villarreal CF *Real Betis *Athletic Bilbao *Sevilla F.C. *Valencia CF *RC Celta de Vigo *C.A. Osasuna *Getafe CF *R.C.D.
